attribute.description: Use the visible attribute to indicate whether the component should be viewable by the user in the rendered HTML page. If set to false, the HTML code for the component is present in the page, but the component is hidden with style attributes. By default, visible is set to true, so HTML for the component HTML is included and visible to the user. If the component is not visible, it can still be processed on subsequent form submissions because the HTML is present.

property-extension.short-description: Hide or show the component to the user -- if false, the component is still rendered on the page so it can be processed
